meanings.definition: A person or thing that reveals something.
meanings.sent1: The revealer of the surprise party was the birthday girl herself.
meanings.sent2: The detective turned out to be the revealer of the hidden truth.
meanings.sent3: The parrot became an unexpected revealer of family secrets with its mimicry.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a revealer of her true feelings, even when she tried to hide them.
meanings.sent5: The old map was a revealer of buried treasure, leading them to unexpected riches.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to reveal or uncover something.
meanings.sent1: The flashlight served as a useful revealer in the dark cave.
meanings.sent2: The magnifying glass was the revealer of hidden fingerprints on the document.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand was a playful revealer of hidden tricks during the show.
meanings.sent4: The key was a revealer of the secret compartment in the antique chest.
meanings.sent5: The x-ray machine was a revealer of the broken bone, confirming the doctor's suspicion.
